name: The Great Library (Tutorial in description)
description:
Aim 

Go to the next day

VERY IMPORTANT - Going to next day

  • Chat with relevant people around the base**
  • Explore the area (notes, other items)**
  • Finish any To-Dos**
  • Open a book from the bookshelf
  • Click the clock icon

Gameplay Tips

  • Training chambers: Do the task and click the back arrow to finish.
  • Controls: WASD + Left Click
  • Enter answer to To-Do: Click the greyed out text ("Eg. paper, maps, ...) and begin typing. Then hit enter.
    • First To-Do:  word should be separated by a comma and a space.
  • Anything written in the "You can scribble here" section gets preserved when changing pages BUT NOT preserved when notebook is closed.
  • To-Dos may require information from previous journal entries or from the library.

Dr. Hayal, welcome to your 12th mission.  There has been a rising insurgence of rogues who believe there is a pattern in the texts. They are committing a crime against the religion of the King. It is believed some of these rogues work as Scholars as well. You must not give in.

Something’s gone wrong in your mission. Your team members are raising your suspicions and are going missing. Do you choose to abort the mission or uncover the truth?

Bugs reported

Will work on providing a much better tutorial after the jam ends.

Credits

Created by angients_ in 7 days as part of Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 

Words list: 3000 Words List by gokhanyavas & Oxford Learner's Dictionaries.

Music: Ambient Transition Sound Effect, Dark Atmosphere, Mysterious Atmosphere Music by SPANAC.

Sound Effect: 'Computer beeps'  LPHypeR, 'Micro-beeps' by AlienXXX, 'Bubble' by Ranner.
